verses.name: Acts 21:31
verses.text: And as they went about to kill him, tidings came unto the chief captain of the band, that all Jerusalem was in an uproar.

verses.name: Acts 21:32
verses.text: Who immediately took soldiers and centurions, and ran down unto them: and when they saw the chief captain and the soldiers, they left beating of Paul.

verses.name: Acts 21:33
verses.text: Then the chief captain came near, and took him, and commanded him to be bound with two chains; and demanded who he was, and what he had done.
